desc: The cloud: is it real or is it just hype?  In this book, Vito and Ivo look beyond the buzzwords and figure out what the cloud is actually about and how PHP developers can take advantage of what cloud computing has to offer. After reading this book, you will not only have a clear picture of what cloud computing is, but youâ€™ll also be able to utilize the various cloud services that are out there.
title: PHP Development in the Cloud
